participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys spending time alone with her thoughts and passions.
participant_1.background: My favorite place to eat is a local cafe where I can get a cup of green tea and watch my favorite superhero shows. I once had to put down my beloved dog, and it was one of the hardest things I've ever done. I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with others. I couldn't live without my cell phone.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Social and outgoing, loves being around people and enjoys a good laugh.
participant_2.background: I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like. I have 3 sisters and 2 brothers. I cannot get enough ginger snaps. I have been bankrupt and back. I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello! How are you?
I am doing great! Thanks for asking.
That's good to hear! I am doing well too.
What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with friends.
Oh, that sounds fun. I'm working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
That's awesome! I have never been to a juice bar before.
You should check one out! They're really good for you.
I will! I love trying new things.
Me too! What do you do for fun?
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
I hear that. I wish I could spend more time with my family too.
Me too. I have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
That's a lot of siblings! I'm an only child.
I love having siblings. We always have someone to play with.
I guess I can see that.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun.
What do you like to do with your siblings?
We play video games, go to the movies, and just hang out.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I had siblings.
You're missing out!
I know! I'm so jealous.
You can always come hang out with me and my siblings!
I would love that!
Great! We'll have to make a plan soon.
Sounds good
